Articles.Content:
Starting a poll to see how many people would want and pay for 90x50cm laminate printouts of the pics on my thread,

keep in mind before answering that i am in newzealand so shipping to the US and such will most likely be high.

Actually... You might want to set up a US Contact for the higher-quality prints with decreased shipping rates and a lower requirement for individual components. This would mean different price scales, but the mailing time would be lower overall, and the profit you could expect would be alot greater.
